_project.description: Get Master Sword without glitches that allow you to get it early
_project.name: Master Sword Restricted

_route: (==) This is a newer version of the route inspired by .code(@MikeysGone). If you are looking for the Mogg Latan route. Go .link([here]https://celer.itntpiston.app/#/gh/iTNTPiston/msr/mogg-latan)

_Equipment::Weapon<Boko Spear>.notes: Can also grab torch. The time save by grabbing torch is canceled out if you threw the torch away during FDC

BLSS or .dir(N>) Turn super.notes: BLSS is about the same as missing the super. 1 pepper backup if missed super

_Shrine::WahgoKatta.notes: Left peg aim at middle white pillar

_Shrine::HilaRao.notes: Safe strat: turn wb up and run. Unsafe strat: 1 wb to monk

.dir(<N) Turn to shrine.notes: Grab 1 small radish closest to shrine if need extra food

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Eat 2 peppers if you are doing the wb + blss strat. 1 pepper is unsafe

.dir(S) + .dir(S>>) + .dir(S) midair.notes: Eat 1 pepper. Can grab 3 apples before statue loads since it takes a while

_Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: If you are swapping Toto Sah and Ha Dahamar with a blss, need to save shield here for BLSS. Otherwise you can break your pot lid in this shrine

.dir(S) super + .dir(S) Delay Turn.notes: If you are doing Toto Sah first, WB up to tree stump and BLSS

_Equipment::Shield<Shield of Mind's Eye>.notes: Turn first apparatus block upside down, Then wb to monk from the apparatus block

_Shrine::QukahNata.notes: Usually unloaded, but if you want to learn the clip go watch .link([this video]https://youtu.be/avrVPjqfJDQ)

.dir(N>) Turn.notes: Raddish before shrine if skipping soh kofi (default)

.dir(N>) Turn + .dir(<E) Turn + .dir(E).notes: You can choose between soh kofi or katah chuki (this route). For soh kofi, follow the movements in the old route

_Shrine::ZeKasho.notes: If not going for the square first where you can pull glider, eat hearty raddish

Cryo block + .dir(N>) + .dir(N) midairs.notes: stam is tight. Can go for a ground wb chain if want

_Shrine::RotaOoh.notes: right peg aim left, slightly right of cardinal

.dir(NE) super or midair.notes: Can also elevator BLSS, but need to steer out of the rocks first

.dir(W) non height + .dir(N) + .dir(.N).notes: Use fairy here if still have
